sentences.en: A bit of benevolence from people in power is not what we need.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的不是当权者的小恩小惠。

sentences.en: Actually, the cruelty/benevolence of the invader is a pretty big factor too. The Qing were eventually accepted in part because they were relatively benevolent toward the population.
sentences.cn: 其实敌人是仁慈还是凶恶也是个很大的因素。清朝最后接受了部分侵略，就是因为他们比起人民显得更亲切一些。

sentences.en: Benevolence had singled him for uncommon benefits.
sentences.cn: 仁慈的力量把他挑出来给以不同寻常的恩赐.

sentences.en: Besides, benevolence can not be measured by the amount of donations.
sentences.cn: 其次，仁慈之心也不能够用捐献的多少来衡量。

sentences.en: He did it out of pure benevolence.
sentences.cn: 他做那件事完全出于善意.

sentences.en: He viewed them with the manner of a fatherly pilot , his countenance radiant with benevolence.
sentences.cn: 他像一位慈父般的老向导那样看着他们, 脸上堆着慈祥的笑容.

sentences.en: I admire the activity of your benevolence.
sentences.cn: 你完全是出于一片手足之情,我很佩服.

sentences.en: I had marked neither modesty, nor benevolence, nor candour, nor refinement in her mind or manners.
sentences.cn: 在她的心灵或举止里,我看不到谦逊, 看不到仁慈, 看不到坦率, 也看不到文雅.

sentences.en: In his opinion, benevolence and expressions of gratitude appear to be subtle but powerful ways to bring happiness into one's life and to extend it.
sentences.cn: 按他的观点，仁慈和表达感谢之情似乎以微妙但强有力的方式把幸福带到生活中，并使它得到延续。

sentences.en: Major Pendennis transacted his benevolence by deputy and by post.
sentences.cn: 潘登尼斯少校依靠代理人和邮局,实施着他的仁爱之心.

sentences.en: Mr. Whitelaw's benevolence would descend like soothing balm.
sentences.cn: 怀特洛先生的仁慈就会象甘露一样从天而降.

sentences.en: My colleagues and I have expressed our high appreciation of their deeds of benevolence on many charity functions held by them.
sentences.cn: 我和我的同事曾在多个华人社团赈灾活动上，向华侨华人的仁爱之举表示高度赞赏与敬意。

sentences.en: Oh , certainly, there's a call on your benevolence, my friend.
sentences.cn: 当然罗, 朋友, 你就该因此大发善心了.

sentences.en: Pray, don't imagine that he conceals depths of benevolence and affection beneath a stern exterior!
sentences.cn: 求求你别妄想他在一副严峻的外表下深深埋藏着善心和恋情!

sentences.en: Such benevolence, however, was not completely disinterested.
sentences.cn: 然而这样的善举并非完全出于大公无私。

sentences.en: The Major's persevering benevolence was not to be balked in this way.
sentences.cn: 少校的仁慈是坚决的,它不会因此就偃旗息鼓.

sentences.en: This orphanage solicits its benevolence of the wealthy people.
sentences.cn: 这所孤儿院恳求富人的善心.

sentences.en: We definitely do not apply a policy of benevolence to the reactionaries.
sentences.cn: 我们对反动派决不施仁政.

words.tran_cn: 良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
